parameters.query: SELECT mc.channel_id, mc.channel_name, mc.style_config, mc.visual_theme FROM media_channels mc WHERE mc.channel_id = $1 LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO media_assets (channel_id, product_id, asset_type, asset_url, metadata, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, 'ltx2_background', $3, $4::jsonb, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (channel_id, asset_type, asset_url) DO UPDATE SET metadata = EXCLUDED.metadata, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id
INSERT INTO kj_knowledge_graph (data_type, source_workflow, channel_id, insights, metadata, created_at) VALUES ('ltx2_background', 'N3-104', $1, $2::jsonb, $3::jsonb, NOW()) RETURNING id

options.queryParams: ={{ [$json.channel_id, JSON.stringify({ visual_theme: $json.visual_theme, motion_style: $json.motion_style, duration: $json.duration }), JSON.stringify({ task_id: $json.task_id })] }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, channel_id: $json.channel_id, video_url: $json.video_url, task_id: $json.task_id }) }}
